select * from thesis where year=#{year} and month=#{month} and grade is null

SELECT u.institutionID, u.specialty, u.stuNumber, u.class AS className, u.studentID, u.YEAR, t.tutorID, t.GROUP, s.email AS email, s.telephone AS telephone, s.NAME, tea.NAME AS tutorName, tea.jobnumber AS tutorJobNumber FROM thesis t INNER JOIN undergraduate u ON t.studentID = u.ID INNER JOIN student s ON s.ID = u.studentID LEFT JOIN teacher tea ON t.tutorID = tea.id
where t.YEAR = #{startYear} AND t.MONTH = #{month} AND u.institutionID = #{institutionID} and u.stuNumber like concat('%', #{stuNumber}, '%') and s.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') and u.specialty like concat('%', #{specialty}, '%') and u.class like concat('%', #{className}, '%') and u.year = #{year} and tea.jobnumber like concat('%', #{tutorJobNumber}, '%') and tea.name like concat('%', #{tutorName}, '%')
ORDER BY stuNumber
